meanings.definition: Of or relating to spelling or correct writing.
meanings.sent1: Her orthographical skills improved after taking a writing course.
meanings.sent2: The teacher praised the student for their orthographical accuracy in the essay.
meanings.sent3: The orthographical errors in the document made it difficult to understand.
meanings.sent4: His orthographical precision was unmatched, like a skilled craftsman.
meanings.sent5: She diligently practiced her orthographical abilities to become a better writer.

meanings.definition: A system of writing or spelling.
meanings.sent1: The new orthographical system simplified the language for beginners.
meanings.sent2: The linguist studied the ancient orthographical conventions of the civilization.
meanings.sent3: In the fantasy novel, the characters deciphered a magical orthographical code.
meanings.sent4: The orthographical structure of the language was like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: Learning the orthographical rules of the language opened up a world of communication.
